transcript: there are pros and cons to fame I was very adamant about not being famous I wanted to be rich and Anonymous that was kind of my vibe for a long time one of the other Pros is we get amazing talent and so it's a fast track of getting way better people in the business and the portfolio companies I really genuinely wish like the guys my heroes that I looked up to Elon and Warren and I call them by their first names because they feel like homies I wish they had made content I want to know what growing Amazon in 1997 was like I want to see what it was like in 2000 or in the.com but that's all we have is one shareholder letter
